name: Zombie Battle: Survival Shooti
description:
This is one of the best zombie hunter survival game. Survival is the main aim. All to be done when you kill the zombie out there in this zombie hunter survival game. The zombie virus crisis has infected the civilians and they are turning into zombies day by day. To save the survivors and stop the zombie virus from city we need a real survivor in this zombie hunting mission. The infected humans are packed with zombies. Time is less and are you ready to be the real Zombie Hunter? Is there any real survivor ?

Your goal is to survive in this zombie hunter survival game. Remember you are the best fps hunter survival and you have to show your real hunting skills to kill all the zombies. Don't get fear of any zombies attack, you have to kill all of them. You have multiple weapons to play, change your weapons according to the levels because zombies are getting strong by each level and killing zombies is your task in this free zombie hunter survival game. Don't let yourself down. Can you survive in this zombie hunter survival strategy game? Every second counts, so the bullet on the right time will decide whether you are going to survive or not.

Features of Zombie Battle: Survival Shooting:
- Plenty of shooting action filled levels
- Amazing Sounds and Music.
- Kill waves of zombie hordes to survive
- Different weapons & guns to choose from
- Smooth and addictive game controls
- Challenging Mission
